All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AppTest
Unit test for simple App.
AssetSetter
Sets up game assets such as objects and enemies.
Boots
Extends the object class to represents Boot objects in game and initializes the boots image.
Character
 
Chest
Extends the object class to represent chest objects in game and initializes the chest image.
CollisionChecker
Handles collision detection within the game, including interactions between characters, objects, and tiles.
Enemy
Represents an enemy character in the game world.
EnemyAI
 
EventChecker
The EventChecker class is responsible for checking events and interactions in the game.
GamePanel
The GamePanel class represents the main panel of the game.
Heart
Extends the object class to represent heart objects in game and initializes heart images based on player status.
KeyChecker
The KeyChecker class implements the KeyListener interface to handle keyboard input in the game.
Main
The main class responsible for starting the game.
Node
 
Object
Acts as a Superclass for in-game object containing the image, object name, collision type, and position on the game map.
Prisoner
 
Skull
Extends the object class to represent skull objects in game and initializes the Skull image.
Tile
Represents a single tile in the game.
TileManager
TileManager handles the loading, management, and rendering of tiles in the map.
UI
 
UtilityTool
Provides utility methods for scaling images.
